channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta pauses international expansion of its Ray-Ban Display glasses
item.description: Meta had originally planned to launch the glasses in France, Italy, Canada, and the U.K. in early 2026.

item.title: Narwal adds AI to its vacuum cleaners to monitor pets and find jewelry
item.description: Narwal's new robo vacuum cleaner switches to quiet mode near a baby's crib.

item.title: Margaret Atwood on Doomscrolling: ‘I Want to Keep Up With the Latest Doom’
item.description: On this week’s episode of The Big Interview, the author of The Handmaid’s Tale talks about Elon Musk, political resistance, and why she still has hope...

item.title: ‘Industry’ Takes on the Age Verification Wars
item.description: In the HBO show’s fourth season, Industry proves to be more prescient than it’s ever been.

item.title: AMD unveils new AI PC processors for general use and gaming at CES
item.description: AMD announced the latest version of its AI-powered PC chips designed for a variety of tasks from gaming to content creation and multitasking.

item.title: Steve Jobs’ Early Apple Items Are Going Up for Auction—Along With His Bow Ties
item.description: Some of the objects came from Steve Jobs’ childhood bedroom. They’re being made available by his stepbrother, John Chovanec.

item.title: Amazon’s Ring doorbells get fire alerts, an app store and new sensors
item.description: The new Ring Sensors can detect motion, openings, glass breakage, and smoke, and can also monitor carbon monoxide levels, leaks, temperature changes, ...

item.title: Ring and Watch Duty Team Up to Keep a Closer Eye on Wildfires
item.description: In a move to help alert people to the spread of nearby blazes, Ring is partnering with Watch Duty to let users share their videos on the wildfire trac...

item.title: Winter Bird Feeding Tips for the Peak of Bird Watching Season (2026)
item.description: Winter is often the best time for bird-watching at bird feeders—here’s what ornithologists recommend to get the most out of the season.

item.title: Insight Partners sued by former vice president Kate Lowry
item.description: Insight Partners sued by former vice president Kate Lowry.
